p: Section 2 indicates the acceleration-induced effect on pressure sensor theoretically. In general, insulation pads and the sensor body of sensors have an insignificant influence on acceleration-induced effects; the diaphragm of sensor is therefore considered when building an ANSYS simulation for the sensor [ 15, 16]. Since the effect of the diaphragm on the quartz crystal can be equivalent to a pressure, we choose only quartz crystal for building the model. The model radius was 9 mm and the thickness was 1 mm, as shown in Figure 3. The finite element type of the model was selected as Solid 5.
